outputs.output_descr:
1. Strengthen capacity of the National Demining Institute in coordination, information management, and quality assurance.
2. Support provided to humanitarian demining operations in the field, including post-clearance inspections and official handover of released land to the provincial authority utilizing the mine-free district approach.
3. Establish of a national mechanism to address residual risks from UXO as part of the government's approach to Explosive Remnants of War

project_title: Support to the National Demining Programme in Mozambique
